definition: a toy consisting of a box from which a toy clown or other figure jumps out when the lid is opened, often accomplished by turning a crank
details:
noun
- a toy consisting of a box from which a toy clown or other figure jumps out when the lid is opened, often accomplished by turning a crank
= example: a toy consisting of a box from which a toy clown or other figure jumps out when the lid is opened, often accomplished by turning a crank
